taskbody.prereq: A fragment file cannot exist outside of a Design Studio Workbench package. The following steps assume that you have an existing package.

step.cmd: On the DS Navigator view pane, right-click the package in which you want to create a new fragment.

step.stepresult: The New Fragment dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: In the Name field, type the name of the new fragment file.
In the Description field, type a description of the fragment file.
Select the type of fragment file to create:
To select the dataset, click Browse.

taskbody.result: The name of the new fragment file is displayed in the DS Navigator view pane in the selected package.
